title: Rebrand from Arweave to LookyLoo with updated login page messaging

requirements.text: Replace all occurrences of 'Arweave' with 'LookyLoo' throughout the application, including page titles, headers, component text, and HTML metadata

quotes: Since it's no longer Arweave, change anything that says "Arweave" to my app name which is "LookyLoo".

acceptanceCriteria: No visible 'Arweave' text remains in the UI
HTML title and meta tags reflect 'LookyLoo'

requirements.text: Update the login page center card title to 'LookyLoo - Frictionless File Share by GeekDice'

quotes: LookyLoo - Frictionless File Share by GeekDice

acceptanceCriteria: Login page displays the exact title 'LookyLoo - Frictionless File Share by GeekDice'
Title maintains visual hierarchy and styling consistency

requirements.text: Update the login page center card description to 'Upload your file and share with anyone. They won't need a wallet or a login to access it.' followed by 'As the owner you'll need to sign in with Internet Identity (IID2)'

quotes: Upload your file and share with anyone. They won't need a wallet or a login to access it. As the owner you'll need to sign in with Internet Identity (IID2)

acceptanceCriteria: Description text matches exactly as specified
Text is properly formatted with appropriate spacing between sentences
Owner authentication note is clearly visible

requirements.text: Change the sign-in button text to 'Sign in or create IID2'

quotes: change the sign in button to read, "Sign in or create IID2)"

acceptanceCriteria: Sign-in button displays 'Sign in or create IID2'
Button maintains existing styling and functionality

constraints: Do not modify current color scheme
Do not modify current font choices
